title: Instructional Design Practical Skills Enhancement: Multiliteracy-Based Science Learning Strategies for Digital Natives

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to critically analyze core concepts of scientific papers using digital tools
Learners design processes for visualizing and interpreting scientific data using online collaboration tools
Learners apply methods to systematically document and share results of digital science experiments
Learners develop digital portfolios that create and critique science content based on multiliteracies (functional and critical literacy)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
